evidence_1.question: Which statement best describes you?
evidence_1.hint: Select ONE ANSWER. If none of the options below applies to you, please change your investor profile.

form.option_1: I earn more than £100,000 per year
form.option_2: I hold net assets of at least £250,000

validation_error_messages.answer_required: Please pick one of the options above

evidence_2_1.question: Please provide details on your income

validation_error_messages.value_should_be_more_than_100000: The FCA requires you to earn more than £100,000 per year to certify as high net worth. Your answer does not meet the minimum.

evidence_2_2.question: Please provide details on your net assets

form.question_label: Total value of your net assets
form.question_placeholder: Total value of your net assets

validation_error_messages.value_should_be_more_than_250000: The FCA requires you to hold net assets of at least £250,000 to certify as high net worth. Your answer does not meet the minimum.

evidence_3.question: Have you made any of the following investments in the last two years?

form.option_1: Private companies through a direct investment
form.option_2: Private companies via a network or business angel syndicate
form.option_3: Tax efficient investments (e.g. EIS, SEIS, VCTs)
form.option_5: Sophisticated investments (e.g unregulated collective investment schemes, foreign currencies, VCTs or commodities)

validation_error_messages.answer_required: Select at least one answer or change your investor profile

evidence_4.question: Please confirm that you have sufficient income and assets to be financially secure and meet your financial commitments
evidence_4.hint: You may find <0>this calculator</0> helpful to work this out.

form.option_1: I confirm that I have sufficient income and assets to be financially secure and to meet my financial commitments, even if I lose the money I invest.

evidence_5.question: Investment opportunities on Seedrs typically take 5-10 years to generate returns, if at all.
evidence_5.statement: By continuing, you agree that this aligns with your investment objectives.
